tables.table_title: The comparisons between our previous work, similar work, and the current study.
rows: Lot-streaming flow shop Stochastic processing times
Number of machines at stage $l, l=1,2$
Number of jobs on machine $i$ at each stage
Job position on a machine, $r=1,2, \ldots, n_{i}$
Job-dependent deteriorating effect of job $j_{i}, j=1,2, \ldots, n$
Deteriorating effect of batch $B_{k}, b=1,2, \ldots, n$
Normal processing time of job $j_{i}, j=1,2, \ldots, n$ at stage $l$,
Actual processing time of job $j_{i}$ at stage $l$, position $r$,
Set the current position as a flag
Set the current position as rand( $)$

tables.table_title: Response value and rank of each parameter.
Comparison between different heuristic based on problem size.
Comparison between different heuristic based on the number of jobs.
Comparison between the lower bound and the optimal results and the runtime.
The $t$ tests for the EDA-DE with the compared algorithms.
